experiences: I completed my matriculation at my hometown, Ramjewar High School Aurai,Muzaffarpur(Bihar), building a strong academic foundation.
I completed my intermediate at Vanijya Inter College, Muzaffarpur, my hometown provided a solid academic foundation and a unique opportunity for personal growth.
I have completed my graduation (B.Tech) from Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV),Bhopal in 2021 with a degree in Software Engineering (CSE)
